channel.title: Disconnect voting & day ability bug
channel.description: #### What happened? You aren't able to vote or use day abilities. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? You should have everything you would have been able to do before dcing. #### Steps to reproduce: Disconnect from the game, reconnect. Might take a few tries. #### Comments: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/867368163163967196/58E036700EF6F0B7AE061812D8E62AB7BBB534ED/
